rows.label: qst720101_msg0001
rows.name: What's this?

rows.label: qst720101_msg0002
rows.name: It's some kind of weird...mist?

rows.label: qst720101_msg0003
rows.name: Must be an ether miasma.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0004
rows.name:
We should do something about this
before it ends up blocking the way
to the harbor.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0005
rows.name:
This wasn't here when I passed
through before...

rows.label: qst720101_msg0006
rows.name:
It does seem to have sprung up
fairly recently.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0007
rows.name:
Bother... This is the only way through
to the harbor where the ship departs.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0008
rows.name:
And there are monsters, too. Maybe the
miasma attracted them somehow...?

rows.label: qst720101_msg0009
rows.name:
Indeed. We should handle this
before more of them show up.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0010
rows.name:
Just let me at that miasma. I'll
blast it into next week.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0011
rows.name:
Yes, and everything in a quarter-mile
radius while you're at it.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0012
rows.name:
What's the problem? Miasma is in
the way, Hikari burns miasma,
miasma no longer in the way. Done.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0013
rows.name:
Hikari, the power you wield is
undeniable.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0014
rows.name:
But all it takes is the slightest
misjudgment and we end up being
no better than Metsu.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0015
rows.name: Um, sorry to interrupt, but...

rows.label: qst720101_msg0016
rows.name:
I think Kasumi's powers should be able
to disperse it.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0017
rows.name: Oh really? That would be very handy!

rows.label: qst720101_msg0018
rows.name:
Yes, I just need a moment of
concentration. Do you think you could
take care of the monsters for me?

rows.label: qst720101_msg0019
rows.name: Say no more. Hikari, you're up.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0020
rows.name:
This seems like a ridiculously over-
complicated way to deal with things,
but my Driver's wish is my command.

rows.label: qst720101_msg0021
rows.name: That'll do! Let's go!
